overview: We finally did it! First!!! The NS Movie Volume 1 is done. And to commemorate its completion, we're doing something special and unique to release the film. On Monday, October 13th at 7pm PST/10pm EST we will be doing a Live NS Webcast of First!!! with streaming & production provided by Adrenaline Garage. Just like the NS Awards and Freestyle.ch, you can watch the live broadcast of the movie and chat along with fellow NSâ€™ers in the comfort of your own home, dorm, or shanty town with net access.
title: First!!!
